statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, recipient_name FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE recipient_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_date, recipient_name, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, recipient_name FROM transaction_history WHERE recipient_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY recipient_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, recipient FROM transactions;
SELECT recipient_name, recipient_email FROM recipients;
SELECT recipient_name AS name, recipient_email AS email FROM recipients;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, recipient_email FROM recipients WHERE recipient_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, recipient FROM transactions WHERE recipient = 'Alice' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT recipient_name, recipient_email FROM recipients WHERE recipient_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT amount, recipient FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE recipient='John';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, recipient FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, recipient FROM transaction_details WHERE recipient = 'John Doe' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE history_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY history_id;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, recipient FROM transaction_details WHERE amount >= 500 AND recipient LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT date, amount, recipient FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_details ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transaction_status WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND transaction_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY user_id, transaction_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.username, ts.status FROM transaction_details t LEFT JOIN user_details u ON t.transaction_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN transaction_status ts ON t.transaction_id = ts.transaction_id WHERE ts.status = 'Approved' ORDER BY t.transaction_id DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.user_id, td.date, td.recipient, ts.status FROM transaction_history th JOIN transaction_details td ON th.transaction_id = td.transaction_id JOIN transaction_status ts ON th.transaction_id = ts.transaction_id WHERE th.user_id = 2 ORDER BY td.date DESC, th.transaction_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT date, amount, recipient FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM account_balance ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE action = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount, recipient FROM transaction_history WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE action = 'approved' ORDER BY date DESC
